title: OBAMA SAVED CHRYSLER SO YOU COULD DRIVE A DEATH TRAP
text: by John Gibson Follow on Twitter, Facebook, listen free/live on foxnewsradio app The news that Fiat-Chrysler is now under orders to buy back half a million Dodge Ram trucks is a stunning book end to the Obama deal to save the auto industry. Fiat, as you will recall, got Chrysler in a fire s
